thread.title: Random running thoughts: Chocolate milk and a fat foot
thread.title_full: Random running thoughts: Chocolate milk and a fat foot

title: Random running thoughts: Chocolate milk and a fat foot
text:
Random running thoughts: Chocolate milk and a fat foot Lots of time to think while preparing for Detroit Free Press Marathon. Post to Facebook Random running thoughts: Chocolate milk and a fat foot Lots of time to think while preparing for Detroit Free Press Marathon.  //www.hometownlife.com/story/sports/running/2015/10/01/random-running-thoughts-chocolate-milk-fat-foot/73078276/   Join the Conversation To   Random running thoughts: Chocolate milk and a fat foot Dan Dean, staff column 6:03 p.m. EDT October 1, 2015 While the author makes fun at his aches and pains, there have been many bright spots along the way including this beautiful sunrise while running at Stoney Creek Metropark early in the morning on Sept. 24. (Photo: Dan Dean) 4 CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
I am 53 â€“ and I am not a runner. My entire body hurts and I have a cardiologist. But I am stubborn and determined to cross the finish line Oct. 18 at the Detroit Free Press Marathon. 
It has been a long haul. Many thoughts have come to mind over the close to 400 miles logged so far in preparation for race day: 
Oh glory, glory! This week is the start of pare down. Only 12 miles Saturday!
